text: LPD or lpd can refer to *La Part-Dieu in Lyon *Landing Platform Dock, a type of naval warship *Laser Phosphor Display, a large-format display technology *Lean Product Development *The Legendary Pink Dots, a European band *Lighting Power Density *Lincoln Police Department, Nebraska, US Police Department *Line Printer Daemon protocol, in Unix-like operating systems *Living Planet Database *Louisville Police Department, now the Louisville Metro Police Department *Lowell Police Department, Massachusetts, US *LPD433, license-free radio communications band *Luteal phase defect *Lymphoproliferative disorders, in which lymphocytes are produced in excessive quantities
title: LPD
